story:
Pink World. You wake up in your room. 
Everything is pink, and you do not understand what is going on. 
You start to walk and face 3 shining doors.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Grandma's room, 
2 to go to Billie's bed, 
and 3 to go to the Excel Class

story:
Orange World. You wake up in your Grandma's room. Everything is orange and bright.
You start to run and see 3 doors in the middle of the dark.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Chokito's bed, 
2 to go to the Beer Store, 
and 3 to go to the Python Class

story: Pink World. Your dog Chokito is sound sleep, suddenly he starts to snore very loudly.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Billie's bed,
2 to go to the Scotiabank Arena,
and 3 to go to Starbucks

story: Orange World. Your dog Billie is playing with her toy, and suddenly she starts to bark.
nav:
Press 1 to go to the Walmart,
2 to go to the Desert,
and 3 to go to Tim Hortons

story:
Pink World. You are at Walmart, you think of getting groceries. 
If someone offers you something to buy, you should take a look at that.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Costco,
2 to go to Starbucks,
and 3 to go to the Train Station

story:
Orange World. You did groceries yesterday, so you start to wonder what the hell you are doing in there. 
Still, if anyone tries to sell you something, why not?
nav:
Press 1 to go to LCBO,
2 to go to the Water Park,
and 3 to go to the Airport

story:
Pink World. I don't know if it was all of that wine, 
but pink things are starting to make sense.
nav:
Press 1 to go to the Beer Store,
2 to go to Walmart,
and 3 to go to the Desert

story:
Orange World. Maybe the beer did not sit well, 
but orange things aren't really supposed to be there.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Cambrian,
2 to go to Chokito's bed,
and 3 to go to the Swimming Pool

story:
Pink World. You blinked your eyes and you realized you are studying at the Cambrian campus.
You wonder how many days since you have last seen the daylight.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Lauretian,
2 to go to Lisgar St.,
and 3 to go to the Principal's Office

story:
Orange World. Lauretian is so beautiful. The orange beach is weird though.
You think about what to do next. Leasure or study?
nav:
Press 1 to go to Maracana,
2 to go to the Excel Class,
and 3 to go to the Lisgar St.

story: Pink World. You finally have a break and go to a soccer game. Today is Brazil x Argentina match.
nav:
Press 1 to go to the Scotiabank Arena,
2 to go to the Excel Class,
and 3 to go to the Water Park

story: Orange World. The Raptors are playing today. Yay! Try and buy some souvenir if you have a chance.
nav:
Press 1 to go to the Lisgar St., 
2 to go to a Dead End street, 
and 3 to go to Maracana

story:
Pink World. Oh, no! La vie n'est pas rose. 
After all the pink overdose you find yourself craving for more colors. 
That is the end for you, my friend.

Orange World. You were asked to the Dean's Office at Cambrian. There is a door there, and it looks so different from everything else.
When you open the door, that is a treasure. You finally can see other colors. 
There is blue, green, violet, red... All colors but...
Pink World. Did you know if you pee in the pink pool, you get a bright red color?
nav:
Press 1 to go to the Desert., 
2 to go to Costco,
and 3 to go to Lauretian

story:
Orange World. You are so thirsty... That OJ really sounds fantastic right now. Or that Fanta.
A carrot juice...
nav:
Press 1 to go to Airport, 
2 to go to Lauretian, 
and 3 to go to Cambrian

story:
Pink World. If you play your cards right it can all be over with one move. 
You just have to pick the right destination.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Train Station, 
2 to go to Principal's Office, 
and 3 to go to Beer Store

story:
Orange World. You're waiting for a train, a train that will take you far away. 
You know where you hope this train will take you, but you don't know for sure. 
But it doesn't matter. How can it not matter to you where that train will take you?
nav:
Press 1 to go to Tim Hortons, 
2 to go to the Airport, 
and 3 to go to LCBO

story: Pink World. Tim Hortons is only selling Pink Lemonade Today. I really wanted some coffee...
nav:
Press 1 to go to Starbucks, 
2 to go to Excel Class, 
and 3 to go to Cotsco

story: Orange World. Why do we just have pumpkin spice latte?
nav:
Press 1 to go to Python Class, 
2 to go to LCBO, 
and 3 to go to Walmart

story: Pink World. It is Python class... And you do not know why you crave some cake!
nav:
Press 1 to go to Excel Class, 
2 to go to Maracan√£, 
and 3 to go to Billie's bed

story: Orange World. Try not to sleep at Excel class, that will help you to finish that Python assignment as well.
nav: Press 1 to go to the Museum

story: Pink World. Pop art everywhere. Why is Marilyn so pink? See if there is something you would like to purchase.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Water Park, 
2 to go to Swimming Pool, 
and 3 to go to Chokito's bed

story: Orange World. You are in the Water Park, too bad the trees have orange leaves, the autumn is not really nice for a swim.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Dead end street, 
2 to go to Tim Hortons, 
and 3 to go to Grandama's room

story: Pink World. That is not productive. A pink wall and a turn-back sign.
nav:
Press 1 to go to Excel Class, 
2 to go to Museum, 
and 3 to go to your room
